Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • Map

  • public class Map
extends java.lang.Object
    Map helper class that contains and initiates each level's maps.
    Time spent: 10 hours
    Updates: 2.0 - modified the map initializer to read separate files and check whether a character is important or not
    3.0 - added a few methods and modified level initiation to include the intro dialogue
    4.0 - modified map arrays to include all maps of a level and modified initializer to suit game events

    Course Info:

    ICS4U0 with Ms. Krasteva
    Version:
    4.0 - 10/06/2019
    Author:
    Stephen Hwang and Juleen Chen

      static int[][] getMap(int level, int room)
      Return method that returns a certain room's map as a 2D array
      Updates: 4.0 - updated to get a room's map
      static int[][][] getMap1()
      Return method that returns the 3D array representing the first level's maps (to avoid code to large error)
      Updates: 4.0 - method created
      static int[][][] getMap2()
      Return method that returns the 3D array representing the second level's maps (to avoid code to large error)
      Updates: 4.0 - method created
      static int[][][] getMap3()
      Return method that returns the 3D array representing the third level's maps (to avoid code to large error)
      Updates: 4.0 - method created
      static int getNumRooms(int level)
      Return method that returns the number of rooms in a level
      Updates: 4.0 - class created
      static java.util.ArrayList<Room> initializeLevel(int level)
      Static return method that returns an ArrayList of all the Characters in a level read from a file
      Updates: 2.0 - changed the file being read from, added if statement to check if a character is important or not
      3.0 - modified method to get the intro as well
      4.0 - now reads and initializes all rooms, intros, and endings

      • getMap

        public static int[][] getMap(int level,
                             int room)
        Return method that returns a certain room's map as a 2D array
        Updates: 4.0 - updated to get a room's map
        Parameters:
        level - the level in which the map is in
        room - which room
        Returns:
        the correct map if the level and room exist or an empty map if the they don't exist

      • getNumRooms

        public static int getNumRooms(int level)
        Return method that returns the number of rooms in a level
        Updates: 4.0 - class created
        Parameters:
        level - the level being checked
        Returns:
        the number of rooms in the level if it exists

      • initializeLevel

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Room> initializeLevel(int level)
        Static return method that returns an ArrayList of all the Characters in a level read from a file
        Updates: 2.0 - changed the file being read from, added if statement to check if a character is important or not
        3.0 - modified method to get the intro as well
        4.0 - now reads and initializes all rooms, intros, and endings 
         Local Variable Library
 Name         Type             Description
 numOfStages  int              The number of stages a level has
 temp         String           Temporary String used to check dialogue before adding it to the Character
 room         Room             Current room being created
 mara         Mara             Current instance of Mara being created
 reader       BufferedReader   Instance of BufferedReader used to read from a file
 rooms        ArrayList<Room>  List of all the characters in a level
 ch           Character        Current character (sometimes important) being created
        Parameters:
        level - the level used
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of all the Room objects in a level
